data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bellis, Glenn, Dyce, Alan, Gopurenko, David, Yanase, Tohru, Garros, Claire, Labuschagne, Karien, Mitchell, Andrew (2013): Revision of the Culicoides (Avaritia) Imicola complex Khamala & Kettle (Diptera: Ceratopogonidae) from the Australasian region. Zootaxa 3768 (4): 401-427, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3768.4.1
